Trade/Device Name(s): ACURA PLUS Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
ACURA PLUS Multi Blood Glucose Meter
ACURA PLUS Multi Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ACURA PLUS Multi Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACURA PLUS Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in whole blood using electrochemical biosensor.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites, for multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings to aid diabetes control; not for neonatal, diagnostic, or screening use.
